tweet_text: @Rajeev_The_King Reminds me of the HIV-Aids years of Mbeki-Manto denialism, and the massive underreporting (esp as Aids deaths are always caused by opportunistic infections, and stigma meant doctors were pressured to write "pneumonia" etc). And here we are again. 😰
